cluster: Extend the domain of trigonometric functions using the unit circle.
description: (+) Use special triangles to determine geometrically the values of sine, cosine, tangent for π/3, π/4 and π/6, and use the unit circle to express the values of sine, cosine, and tangent for , π + , and 2π -  in terms of their values for , where  is any real number.
